SEARCH
Package world

Class World

java.lang.Object
world.World
public class World extends Object
Represents the simulation world grid that contains and manages all organisms. Provides functionality for simulation turns, movement, reproduction, logging, saving/loading world state, and interaction management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    World(int width, int height)
    Constructs a new simulation world of the specified dimensions.
